Articles.Content: Just got the new DLC for KSP, and I can't figure out how to switch launch sites, despite a good 30 minutes of searching online. Anyone know?

When ingame hit Escape--> Settings--> Difficulty Options--> Allow other Launchsites, its in the first screen you get.

After that when you hover your mouse a bit under the launch button the options should pop up.

Maybe it should be on by default and whoever needs extra challenge could just turn it off.

Edited April 30, 2018 by Boyster
Assuming that you also are playing career mode, you also need to upgrade your VAB or SPH once in order to activate the additional launchsites -- besides the button Boyster told you to click.
